books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: A New Yorker gets a surprise when she spends the summer with her boyfriend in Singapore.
books.name: CRAZY RICH ASIANS

books.author: by James Patterson and Andrew Bourelle
books.description: Rory Yates's job and reputation are at risk when he is accused of killing his ex-wife.
books.name: TEXAS RANGER

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: A symbology professor goes on a perilous quest with a beautiful museum director.
books.name: ORIGIN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: After a stay at a psychiatric hospital, a reporter reluctantly returns to her hometown to cover the murders of two girls.
books.name: SHARP OBJECTS

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: Mary DiNunzio and Bennie Rosato must solve a murder and handle a reverse sex discrimination suit against their firm.
books.name: FEARED

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: The second book in the Crazy Rich Asians trilogy. As her wedding draws near, Rachel Chu discovers her birth father.
books.name: CHINA RICH GIRLFRIEND

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A pilot navigates treacherous situations when he attempts to deliver a mysterious black box to a doctor in Georgia.
books.name: TAILSPIN

books.author: by James Patterson and Bill Clinton
books.description: President Jonathan Duncan, a Gulf War veteran and widower, takes on adversaries at home and abroad.
books.name: THE PRESIDENT IS MISSING

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: The final book in the Crazy Rich Asians trilogy. Rivalries and jealousies arise among privileged families.
books.name: RICH PEOPLE PROBLEMS

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Three students at a sleazy for-profit law school hope to expose the student-loan banker who runs it.
books.name: THE ROOSTER BAR

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, the art restorer and assassin, fights the Russians to decide the fate of postwar global order.
books.name: THE OTHER WOMAN

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A detective investigates a seemingly wholesome member of the community when an 11-year-old boy’s body is found.
books.name: THE OUTSIDER

books.author: by Andrew Sean Greer
books.description: Winner of the 2018 Pulitzer Prize in fiction. To avoid an ex-boyfriend's wedding, a failed novelist attends literary events around the world.
books.name: LESS

books.author: by Meghan March
books.description: Despite a family feud, a Riscoff is attracted to a seemingly single Gable.
books.name: RICHER THAN SIN
